dt: {bc}of, relating to, or associated with sex or the sexes

shortdef: of, relating to, or associated with sex or the sexes

dt: {bc}illegal sexual contact that usually involves force upon a person without consent or is inflicted upon a person who is incapable of giving consent (as because of age or physical or mental incapacity) or who places the assailant (such as a doctor) in a position of trust or authority

shortdef: illegal sexual contact that usually involves force upon a person without consent or is inflicted upon a person who is incapable of giving consent (as because of age or physical or mental incapacity) or who places the assailant (such as a doctor) in a position of trust or authority

dt: {bc}the generation of an organism with alternation of generations that reproduces sexually

shortdef: the generation of an organism with alternation of generations that reproduces sexually

dt: {bc}uninvited and unwelcome verbal or physical behavior of a sexual nature especially by a person in authority toward a subordinate (such as an employee or student)

shortdef: uninvited and unwelcome verbal or physical behavior of a sexual nature especially by a person in authority toward a subordinate (such as an employee or student)

dt: {bc}heterosexual intercourse involving penetration of the vagina by the penis {bc}{sx|coitus||}
{bc}intercourse (such as anal or oral intercourse) that does not involve penetration of the vagina by the penis

shortdef: heterosexual intercourse involving penetration of the vagina by the penis : coitus
intercourse (such as anal or oral intercourse) that does not involve penetration of the vagina by the penis

dt: {bc}a person's sexual identity or self-identification as bisexual, straight, gay, pansexual, etc. {bc}the state of being bisexual, straight, gay, pansexual, etc.

dt.t: Last summer a proposal submitted to Family Dollar Stores … persuaded the company's board to adopt a policy prohibiting discrimination based on {wi}sexual orientation{/wi} or {d_link|gender identity|gender identity}.
Liberace went to extraordinary lengths to hide his {wi}sexual orientation{/wi} from the public.

shortdef: a person's sexual identity or self-identification as bisexual, straight, gay, pansexual, etc. : the state of being bisexual, straight, gay, pansexual, etc.

dt: {bc}a person who has committed a sexually violent offense and especially one who is likely to commit more sexual offenses

shortdef: a person who has committed a sexually violent offense and especially one who is likely to commit more sexual offenses

pt: The term {it}sexual preference{/it} as used to refer to sexual orientation is widely considered offensive in its implied suggestion that a person can choose who they are sexually or romantically attracted to.

dt: {bc}natural selection for characters that confer success in competition for a mate as distinguished from competition with other species
{bc}the choice of a mate based on a preference for certain characteristics (such as color or bird song)

shortdef: natural selection for characters that confer success in competition for a mate as distinguished from competition with other species; also : the choice of a mate based on a preference for certain characteristics (such as color or bird song)
